items.sentence: I don\'t like to send postcards when I\'m on a trip.
Tom recognized Mary the moment she entered the room.
Tom refused to eat what his mother put on the table.
Tom rose to go, but Mary asked him to sit back down.
Tom said goodbye and then walked out the front door.
You aren\'t suggesting Tom didn\'t do that, are you?
I told you I don\'t know if Tom will tell the truth.
I tried to persuade Tom to do that, but I couldn\'t.
I understand a little French, but I can\'t speak it.
I used to eat pizza, but now I don\'t eat it at all.
The plan was kept under wraps until the last minute.
The police are investigating the cause of the crash.
The police no longer believe that Tom murdered Mary.
I have a long list of things I have to do this week.
I hope Tom remembered to do what we asked him to do.
I hope you can come up with a better plan than this.
I spend at least three hours a week studying French.
I spent the morning trying to figure out what to do.
Tom knew Mary wouldn\'t be able to convince anybody.
Tom likes listening to the radio when he\'s driving.
